metadata.title: CVE-2010-4653 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An integer overflow condition in poppler before 0.16.3 can occur whenparsing CharCodes for fonts.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-4653` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xpdf - 3.02-9
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: xpdf package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.02-9').
